name: Spot the Difference: Supermarket Mania
description:
Can you find the differences between the two pictures? You don't have much time, better find them fast! Spot the Difference: Supermarket Mania is a creative seek and find puzzle challenge that presents you with two different pictures on the screen. Look at each one and seek out the differences between the two. Find them all, solve the puzzle, and do it before time runs out! It's a challenge, but you can do it!

Spot the Difference: Supermarket Mania comes with three different modes to play: time attack, zen and standard time mode. Each one gives you a new seek and find challenge to complete using two pictures from the supermarket. Solve the puzzles across 15 different stages, and if you get stuck, use a hint to help you out! You can even freeze time or even add more time to help complete the challenges.

Features:
- A fun seek and find puzzle game.
- Many different picture pairs to see.
- Challenging puzzles to solve.
- Relaxing zen mode in case you don't want to seek and find very fast.

How to Play:
- Look at the two pictures and seek the differences.
- Tap each difference to mark it.
- Work fast to solve the puzzle. Time is ticking!

Wanna have more games? We would love to hear from you!
